result:
## Summary

Advanced Dashboard Interaction System implementation completed successfully. Created comprehensive interactive features for the vision dashboard including draggable nodes, auto-scaling trees, floating chat module, collapsible task trees with animations, multi-tree workspace management, and smart layout algorithms. All functionality documented in UIUX_INTERACTION_SPEC.md with complete implementation details and user experience specifications.

context.task:
UIUX: Advanced Dashboard Interaction System

This is a complex UI/UX overhaul for the vision dashboard. Break into sub-tasks as needed.

## CORE FEATURES:

### 1. DRAGGABLE NODES
- User can click and drag any node in a task tree
- Nodes maintain their tree relationships but can be repositioned
- Connection lines update dynamically as nodes move
- Positions persist during session (localStorage?)

### 2. AUTO-SCALING TREES
- As a tree grows (more nodes), it should SHRINK proportionally
- Trees should never fill the entire screen
- User should always be able to see the big picture
- Smooth scaling animation as nodes are added
- Minimum readable size (don't shrink to unreadable)

### 3. FLOATING CHAT MODULE
- Chat input is a draggable, floating panel
- User can move it anywhere on the workspace
- Can be collapsed/minimized
- Remembers position

### 4. COLLAPSIBLE TASK TREES (Mini Mode)
- User can collapse a running task tree into a compact form
- Thunk-thunk-thunk animation collapses nodes into each other
- Collapsed state shows: small icon + running summary text
- Summary updates in real-time showing current status
- User retains visibility without visual clutter
- Click to expand back to full tree view

### 5. MULTI-TREE WORKSPACE
- Multiple parallel task trees can exist simultaneously
- Each tree is independently draggable and scalable
- Trees don't overlap (or if they do, z-index management)
- User can arrange their workspace as they prefer

### 6. SMART LAYOUT
- Trees auto-arrange to avoid overlap on spawn
- Anchoring system: trees anchor to user-set positions
- New trees spawn in available space
- Resize/reflow when window size changes

## IMPLEMENTATION APPROACH:
Break into sub-tasks:
1. Draggable nodes (interact.js or vanilla drag API)
2. Auto-scaling system (transform: scale() based on node count)
3. Floating chat module (draggable panel component)
4. Collapse/expand tree animation
5. Multi-tree state management
6. Smart layout algorithm

## OUTPUT:
- Updated dashboard_vision.js with interaction system
- Updated dashboard_vision.css with scaling/drag styles
- UIUX_INTERACTION_SPEC.md documenting the system
